message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $11000. This is my best offer for now.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think $9500 is a fair price for this product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500. I think $10500 is a more reasonable price, considering the value this product brings. Let's meet in the middle again.
I'm willing to meet you at $9750, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you accept this price?
I'm still not convinced that $9750 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $10000. This is my final offer.
